markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Chemical Contagion](/Feats.aspx?ID=6387) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 210 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetypes** [Poisoner](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=259), [Poisoner](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=71) (Level 18)

**Prerequisites**
[Poisoner Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6382)

</column>

---

Your injury [poisons](/Traits.aspx?ID=669) can spray onto creatures. You gain the [toxicologist](/ResearchFields.aspx?ID=4) alchemist's greater field discovery.
name: Chemical Contagion
